text: That Cold Day in the Park is a 1969 Canadian suspense drama movie directed by Robert Altman and based on novel of the same name by Peter Miles. It stars Sandy Dennis, Michael Burns, Linda Sorenson, Susanne Benton, Luana Anders, Michael Murphy. ==Other websites== * Category:1969 drama movies Category:1960s psychological movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Altman Category:Movies based on books Category:American independent movies Category:Movies set in Vancouver
title: That Cold Day in the Park
